function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variability in infectious period and asymptomatic cases for COVID-19","Impact":"Difficulty in identifying and isolating infected individuals, leading to higher transmission rates","Mitigation":"Robust testing and contact tracing to identify and isolate infected individuals","Technologies":"Testing kits, contact tracing apps","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Failure of social distancing measures to curb disease transmission","Impact":"Increased disease transmission and potential for second outbreak","Mitigation":"Education and enforcement of social distancing measures, increased public awareness","Technologies":"Public communication channels, enforcement agencies","People":"General population, enforcement agencies","Owner":"Government agencies, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Reliance on herd immunity to combat COVID-19","Impact":"Potential for a large number of infections and strain on healthcare system","Mitigation":"Emphasize vaccination and individual protective measures, discourage reliance on herd immunity","Technologies":"Vaccination programs, public health campaigns","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"}]}
